name: Basic Membership
description: A great choice for those who want to get started with basic gym access.

name: Standard Membership
description: Includes everything in Basic Membership plus access to group classes.

name: Premium Membership
benefits: One personal training session per month
description: Best value membership with additional perks for serious fitness enthusiasts.

name: Annual Membership
benefits: Three personal training sessions per month
One free guest pass per month
description: Get a full year of unlimited access and exclusive benefits at a discounted rate.

name: Student Membership
description: Special rate for students with a valid student ID.
